page.title: 14CWM DALE SPRING STRETTON
page.content:
The Cwm Dale Spring is owned by Wells Drinks Ltd. but is known locally as the Pop Works. The Pop Works has very special water because of the pureness of the spring water. Their factory is in Church Stretton and they bottle the water there. They also sell coke, orangeade and some other things.
Outside there is a notice saying {S.H.M.W.CO { Manufacturer of mineral waters { The Cwm Dale Spring {This is one of the purest waters {which has ever come under my notice {or of which I have seen any record. { Francis Sutton. F.C.S.F.I.C.
The water is bottled and sent all over the world and people come from a long way to get it.
